Source code for test_heatequation

from heatequation import *
import numpy as np


[docs]def test_1():
    T0=10
    Ta=10
    Tb=10
    T=heatequation(Ta,Tb,T0,0.01,1,100)
    assert (np.linalg.norm(T)/len(T)-10) < 10**(-2)

    T0=5
    Ta=10
    Tb=40
    T=heatequation(Ta,Tb,T0,0.01,1,100)
    assert max(T) <= max([T0,Ta,Tb])
    assert min(T) >= min([T0,Ta,Tb])
